Actions.ActionName: SET List of PDF Menu Items for Prompt
Actions.Text:
Open PDF in Preview
Save as PDF…
Save as PostScript…
Add PDF to iBooks
Mail PDF
Save as Adobe PDF
Send PDF via Messages
Save PDF to DEVONthink Pro
Save PDF to Evernote

Actions.ActionName: SET Default Value of MenuItem IF it does NOT exist

ThenActions.ActionName: SET PDF Menu Item to Process

Actions.Title: SELECT PDF Menu Item to Use
Actions.Prompt: Your selection will be used with the PDF Menu on the Print Dialog.

Actions.ActionName: SELECT PDF Menu Item by Typing
